Entries.{{ModId}}_Ceridwen01/f {{ModId}}_Ceridwe: caldera/8 7/farmer 8 3 2 {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 8 8 0/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 40/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "@? You're becoming somewhat of a regular visitor."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 2 1/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 2 0 0/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "Come closer... I want to share something with you."/emote farmer 40/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$3Don't look so nervous. I only bite my nails these days."/move farmer 0 7 1/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "This simple bottle is soaked in lives long gone. From the laughter of a man drinking from it, to the quiet hands that shaped it."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen -1 0 3/pause 400/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$2I haven't touched blood in centuries. It's too metallic. Too guilty."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 1 0 1/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "But memories? They’re lighter. Sweet, but never filling."/move farmer 1 0 1/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1This old train station is like a cellar full of bottled years, and you're something fresh..."/pause 1000/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Strange. I almost feel... hopeful?"/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 32/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 0 3/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Come again, would you? I rather enjoyed that."/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Ceridwen02/f {{ModId}}_Ceridwe: caldera/8 7/farmer 8 3 2 {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 9 8 3/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$2Sometimes I wander down here at night, pacing back and forth to try to clear my mind."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen -1 0 3/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen -1 0 3/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$2I tell myself it’s exercise, but really it’s the weight of three thousand years rattling around in my skull."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 1 0 1/pause 500/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$2I regret so much of it. Every sip I took... they never fade, not really."/emote farmer 28/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "Ah, forgive me. I don’t mean to drown you in cobwebs."/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 40/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 -1 0/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "But when you’re here, talking feels lighter. Less like a confession and more like talking to a friend..."/pause 600/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Do you mind if I call you that? A friend?"/emote farmer 32/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Good. Then maybe I'll pace a little slower tonight."/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Ceridwen03/f {{ModId}}_Ceridwe: caldera/8 7/farmer 8 3 2 {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 8 9 2/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 24/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "Odd... I’ve been much less hungry this past week."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 -1 0/pause 500/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 -1 0/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Usually, I cling to relics like a moth to candlelight. Lately, though, I find myself waiting for footsteps instead."/move farmer 0 2 2/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$3Your footsteps."/pause 700/emote farmer 28/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "It's strange that the anticipation has been quelling my hunger..."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 -1 0/pause 400/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "I wonder if I could walk in the sun if I thought about you enough..."/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 32/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$3Don’t let it go to your head, I'm only kidding."/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Ceridwen04/f {{ModId}}_Ceridwe: caldera/8 7/farmer 8 3 2 {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 10 8 1/pause 1200/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "You know... I’ve always liked listening to the sounds down here."/pause 600/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1The dripping water, the creaking pipes... Sometimes, I weave them into music. It's a genre I call sewer-rock."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen -2 0 0/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Would you like to hear one of my songs?"/emote farmer 32/pause 800/move farmer 0 3 2/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$3Good. Listen closely to the pipes..."/stopMusic/pause 500/playMusic CeridwenSong/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0/pause 1000/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 1/pause 1000/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 56/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 2/pause 1000/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 3/pause 1000/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0/pause 1000/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 56/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 1/pause 1000/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 2/pause 1000/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 3/pause 1000/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 56/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0/pause 1000/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 1/pause 1000/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 2/pause 1000/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 56/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 3/pause 1000/glow 34 139 34 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0/pause 1000/glow 0 0 255 true/faceDirection {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0/pause 1000/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 56/stopMusic/stopGlowing/pause 1000/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Not quite a concert, but you make a great audience."/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 32/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Thanks for listening, @. If you ever want an encore, I take requests for drips and clanks."/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Ceridwen05/f {{ModId}}_Ceridwe: caldera/8 7/farmer 8 3 2 {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 9 8 1/pause 1000/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 40/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "Three thousand years, and only now do I realize... I didn’t need to chain myself to the past."/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 0 -1 0/pause 500/move {{ModId}}_Ceridwen -1 0 0/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "I survived off of blood, then memories, and now... hope. I feel different though. It's not hunger anymore."/move farmer 0 2 2/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1I thought I felt my heart beat last night. Only once, but still."/pause 800/emote farmer 32/emote {{ModId}}_Ceridwen 40/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Thank you, @, for everything. You've brought life to something long dead."/pause 1000/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$3No promises I won’t still be cryptic, though."/emote farmer 20/speak {{ModId}}_Ceridwen "$1Now go, before I get too sentimental."/end
